attributes.action: Ban fire works from public sale..create controlled firework diplays
attributes.additional_details: to many children injured animals and wild life injurd and killed ..young adults strapping fire works to cats nd hdgehigs which are a declining specie .i run a hedgehog hospital and what i see come in the doors is heartbreaking to even think that some young adults think the way they do and use fireworks strapped to wildlife as fun ... this has gone on to long and the only way to stop this is to take control of it
attributes.background: I wish for you to ban the sale of fireworks  every year there are so  many  children and wildlife  maimed and even killed every year .I run a hedgehog hospital and what I see is heartbreaking people.even strap fireworks to animals .the only way to stop this is to control it
